meanings.definition: A fictitious name used by an author to conceal their identity.
meanings.sent1: The author chose to publish the book under a pseudonym.
meanings.sent2: She decided to write under a pseudonym to keep her real name private.
meanings.sent3: The detective novel was written by a pseudonym-loving writer.
meanings.sent4: In the world of spies, a pseudonym is as crucial as a hidden code.
meanings.sent5: The pseudonym on the cover intrigued readers to uncover the true author.

meanings.definition: A false or assumed name used by a person.
meanings.sent1: The celebrity checked into the hotel using a pseudonym.
meanings.sent2: Using a pseudonym, the artist created a mysterious persona.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone wore a pseudonym tag for fun.
meanings.sent4: The criminal mastermind operated under a pseudonym to evade capture.
meanings.sent5: The pseudonym on the package hid the sender's real identity.
